game.name: Echoes of the Stars
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Confront fate and the gods themselves in Echoes of the Stars, a 2D Handpainted Action RPG. Explore diverse biomes, gain new skills, fight challenging foes, unlock new abilities, play mini-games, and unfold the epic journey of Eldric and Rin.
